Footer.description: The main platform for developers and players of Brazilian games. Connecting talent, fostering creativity, and celebrating the vibrant Brazilian gaming culture.

FooterOld.description: The leading Brazilian platform for indie game developers and players. Connecting talent, fostering creativity and celebrating the vibrant Brazilian gamer culture.
FooterOld.copyright: Â© 2025 All rights reserved to LUDUS. 100% Brazilian.

GameJamSection.title: Game Jam
GameJamSection.description: Participate in creative competitions, develop games within a limited time, and connect with the Brazilian indie community.
GameJamSection.coming_soon_message: This feature is under development and will be available soon!

coming_soon.title: Coming Soon: Your First Game Jam!
coming_soon.description: We're creating a complete space to host game jams. You'll be able to create games, vote for your favorites, and compete for amazing prizes!

creative_competitions.title: Creative Competitions
creative_competitions.description: Participate in themed challenges inspired by Brazilian culture

active_community.title: Active Community
active_community.description: Connect with other Brazilian indie developers

regular_events.title: Regular Events
regular_events.description: New game jams launched monthly with exclusive prizes

guaranteed_visibility.title: Guaranteed Visibility
guaranteed_visibility.description: Games created in jams receive special visibility on the platform
